v.v: God, act mercifully toward us and bless us;
Do this in order that everyone in the world may know what you want them to do,
God, I desire that all people groups may praise you;
I desire that the people of all nations will be glad and sing joyfully
God, I desire that the people groups may praise you;
Good crops have grown on our land;

v: and the people of all nations may know that you have the power to save them.
I want them all to praise you!
because you judge the people groups equally,
and you guide all the nations in the world.
I want them all to praise you!
God, our God, has blessed us.
I desire that all people everywhere on the earth may have an awesome respect for him.
